reqs:
This is a core course for a Minor in Education, Interpersonal Development.
This is an elective course for the Diploma in Education - Guidance Studies.
Registration is restricted to students in the Faculty of Education for the first three weeks of registration.
Wait lists are not offered.

courseName: The Personal and Social Development of the Adult
description: Personal and social adjustment issues for professional counsellors; basic skills necessary for effective group counselling.
